attacks.name: Find a Friend
attacks.effect: Search your deck for a Grass Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

abilities.name: Table Service
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may heal 30 damage from 1 of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Punch and Run
attacks.effect: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Sleep Spore
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Reckless Charge
attacks.effect: This Pokémon does 10 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Wild Tackle
attacks.effect: This Pokémon does 50 damage to itself.

abilities.name: Security Guard
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, all of your Pokémon take 30 less damage from your opponent’s attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Panic
attacks.effect: This Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Hold Still
attacks.effect: Heal 10 damage from this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Evasion Jutsu
abilities.effect: If any damage is done to this Pokémon by attacks, flip a coin. If heads, prevent that damage.

attacks.name: Furious Shurikens
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 damage to 2 of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Scout
attacks.effect: Your opponent reveals their hand.

attacks.name: Surprise Attack
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

abilities.name: Pantomime
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may switch 1 of your face-down Prize cards with the top card of your deck.

attacks.name: Juggling
attacks.effect: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Psyjack
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent’s Active Pokémon’s attacks. That Pokémon can’t use that attack during your opponent’s next turn.

attacks.name: Break Burn
attacks.effect: Discard 2 Psychic Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Directing Traffic
attacks.effect: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck and put them back in any order.

attacks.name: Cross Chop
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 60 more damage.

attacks.name: Healing Melody
attacks.effect: Heal 10 damage from each of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Play Rough
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Continuous Lick
attacks.effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Copy Anything
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon’s attacks and use it as this attack. If this Pokémon doesn’t have the necessary Energy to use that attack, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Pitch
attacks.effect: Your opponent switches their Active Pokémon with 1 of their Benched Pokémon.
